Abstract

Translation of all the documentation from Alastriaâ€™s repositories to english and spanish.

Motivation

Some English-speaking companies are showing interest in the project. Despite all the current partners are Spanish, we should provide all the technical documentation in English and Spanish to enable anyone to understand the project, join it and contribute.
